price: Na hakika Mola wako Mlezi anayajua yanayo ficha vifua vyao na wanayo yatangaza.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu, Mola wako Mlezi, hapana shaka anajua kila wanalo lificha na wanalo litangaza, ikiwa maneno au vitendo viovu. Naye atakuja walipa kwayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka layaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
